statements: SELECT * FROM telecomm_security_experts_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM telecomm_security_experts_incidents ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM telecomm_security_experts_incidents WHERE incident_id = 3;
SELECT incident_description, resolution FROM telecomm_security_experts_incidents WHERE resolution IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM telecomm_security_experts_incidents ORDER BY incident_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM telecomm_security_experts_incidents ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM telecomm_security_experts_incidents WHERE resolution IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM telecomm_security_experts_incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM telecomm_security_experts_incidents WHERE resolution = 'Under investigation' AND incident_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM telecomm_security_experts_incidents ORDER BY incident_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM incident_response_plans ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT incident_description FROM incident_response_plans WHERE id = 5;
SELECT response_plan FROM incident_response_plans WHERE id < 10;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, resolution FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM incident_response_plans;
SELECT id, incident_description FROM incident_response_plans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT incident_description FROM incident_response_plans ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_incidents FROM incident_response_plans;
SELECT incident_description, COUNT(*) as total_incidents FROM incident_response_plans GROUP BY incident_description;
SELECT * FROM IncidentResponsePlan;
SELECT id, plan_name, responsible_team FROM IncidentResponsePlan ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT incident_type, description, severity FROM SecurityIncident WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT * FROM IncidentResponsePlan WHERE responsible_team = 'IT Support';
SELECT id, incident_type, resolution_summary, resolved_by FROM SecurityIncident INNER JOIN IncidentResolution ON SecurityIncident.id = IncidentResolution.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM IncidentResponsePlan;
SELECT plan_name, responsible_team FROM IncidentResponsePlan ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT incident_type, description, severity FROM SecurityIncident WHERE severity > 2;
SELECT * FROM IncidentResolution WHERE resolved_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, resolution_summary FROM IncidentResolution WHERE resolved_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM IncidentResponsePlan;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM IncidentResponsePlan;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT expert_name, expertise_area FROM TelecomExperts ORDER BY expert_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM IncidentResponsePlan;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM IncidentResponsePlan ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Hacking' AND incident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT i.incident_id, r.resolution_date, r.resolution_description FROM IncidentSecurityIncidents i JOIN IncidentResolution r ON i.incident_id = r.incident_id;
SELECT expert_name, expertise_area FROM TelecomExperts WHERE expertise_area LIKE '%network%' ORDER BY expert_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Incident_Response_Plans;
SELECT plan_name, description FROM Incident_Response_Plans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Security_Incidents WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY datetime_occurred DESC;
SELECT incident_name, incident_description FROM Security_Incidents WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM Incident_Resolution WHERE resolved_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, plan_name, description FROM Incident_Response_Plans WHERE datetime_created > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY datetime_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM Security_Incidents WHERE status = 'Open' AND severity = 'High';
SELECT incident_id, resolution_description, resolved_by FROM Incident_Resolution ORDER BY datetime_resolved ASC;
SELECT property_name, property_value FROM Incident_Properties WHERE property_name LIKE '%IP%';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_members FROM Incident_Teams WHERE team_name IN ('Blue Team', 'Red Team');
